languages.text: {n}Ксиони Эрэбис медленно кивает в ответ — с печальной улыбкой на устах.{/n} "Назвали. Но Император забрал ее у нас. Неумирающий Император".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ксиони Эрэбис медленно кивает в ответ — с печальной улыбкой на устах.{/n} "Назвали. Но Император Неумирающий забрал ее у нас".

languages.text: {n}Xioni Erebis nods slowly in response, a sad smile upon her lips.{/n} "We did. But the Emperor took her from us. The Undying Emperor."
languages.original_text: {n}Ксиони Эрэбис медленно кивает в ответ — с печальной улыбкой на устах.{/n} "Назвали. Но Император забрал ее у нас. Неумирающий Император".

traits.locale_text: {n}Xioni Erebis nods slowly in response, a sad smile upon her lips.{/n} "We did. But the Emperor took her from us. The Undying Emperor."
{n}Xioni Erebis nods slowly in response, a sad smile upon her lips.{/n} "We did. But the Undying One took her from us."
{n}Xioni Erebis nods slowly in response, a sad smile upon her lips.{/n} "We did. But the Emperor took her from us. The Undying Emperor."

{n}Xioni Erebis nods slowly in response, a sad smile upon her lips.{/n} "We did. But the Emperor took her from us. The Undying Emperor."

languages.text: {n}Xioni Erebis acquiesce lentement, un sourire triste aux lèvres.{/n} « Bien sûr que si. Mais l'Empereur nous l'a enlevée. L'Empereur Immortel. »
languages.original_text: {n}Xioni Erebis nods slowly in response, a sad smile upon her lips.{/n} "We did. But the Emperor took her from us. The Undying Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Xioni Erebis acquiesce lentement, un sourire triste aux lèvres.{/n} « Bien sûr que si. Mais l'Empereur nous l'a enlevée. L'Empereur Immortel. »

languages.text: {n}Xioni Erebis asiente lentamente en respuesta con una sonrisa triste.{/n} «Así es. Pero el Emperador nos la arrebató. El Emperador Inmortal».
languages.original_text: {n}Xioni Erebis nods slowly in response, a sad smile upon her lips.{/n} "We did. But the Emperor took her from us. The Undying Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Xioni Erebis asiente lentamente en respuesta con una sonrisa triste.{/n} «Así es. Pero el Emperador nos la arrebató. El Emperador Inmortal».

languages.text: {n}シオニ・エレビスは、口元に悲しげな笑みを浮かべ、ゆっくりとうなずいた。{/n}「そうです。ですが、皇帝が彼女を連れて行ったのです。不死の皇帝が」
languages.original_text: {n}Xioni Erebis nods slowly in response, a sad smile upon her lips.{/n} "We did. But the Emperor took her from us. The Undying Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}シオニ・エレビスは、口元に悲しげな笑みを浮かべ、ゆっくりとうなずいた。{/n}「そうです。ですが、皇帝が彼女を連れて行ったのです。不死の皇帝が」

languages.text: {n}肖妮·伊雷比斯慢慢点了点头，嘴角挂着哀伤的微笑。{/n}“我们确实有个女儿叫拿基，但神皇将她从我们身边带走了，不死神皇。”
languages.original_text: {n}Xioni Erebis nods slowly in response, a sad smile upon her lips.{/n} "We did. But the Emperor took her from us. The Undying Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}肖妮·伊雷比斯慢慢点了点头，嘴角挂着哀伤的微笑。{/n}“我们确实有个女儿叫拿基，但神皇将她从我们身边带走了，不死神皇。”

languages.text: {n}Xioni Erebis nickt langsam. Ein trauriges Lächeln umspielt ihre Lippen.{/n} "Das haben wir. Aber der Imperator hat sie uns genommen. Der Todlose Imperator."
languages.original_text: {n}Xioni Erebis nods slowly in response, a sad smile upon her lips.{/n} "We did. But the Emperor took her from us. The Undying Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Xioni Erebis nickt langsam. Ein trauriges Lächeln umspielt ihre Lippen.{/n}Das haben wir. Aber der Imperator hat sie uns genommen. Der Todlose Imperator."

languages.text: {n}Xioni Erebis, yanıt olarak yavaşça başını eğiyor. Dudaklarına efkârlı bir gülümseme hâkim oluyor.{/n} "Naaki isminde bir kızımız vardı fakat İmparator onu bizden aldı. Ölmeyen İmparator..."
languages.original_text: {n}Xioni Erebis nods slowly in response, a sad smile upon her lips.{/n} "We did. But the Emperor took her from us. The Undying Emperor."
